Package pacman.models

Class ScoreManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • pacman.models.ScoreManager
  • public class ScoreManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Model for the scoreboard displayed below the maze.

      • loseLife

        public void loseLife()
        Decreases the number of lives, and takes away the points penalty, then updates the text on screen.

        Resets the ScoreManager to default values, then updates the text on screen.

      • init

        public void init​(javafx.scene.text.Text scoreText,
                 javafx.scene.text.Text livesText)
        Binds the view elements, and then updates them with the correct score and lives values.
        Parameters:
        scoreText - Element in the view to display the current score.
        livesText - Element in the view to display the current lives.

      • readHighScores

        private int[] readHighScores​(java.lang.String fileHash)
        Reads the high scores from csv file into memory.
        Parameters:
        fileHash - Hash of the currently loaded map file to load the high scores for.
        Returns:
        int array of high scores.

      • updateHighScores

        Writes the new high scores to the disk.
        Parameters:
        fileHash - Hash of the current map file to write high scores for.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
